import React from 'react'; import { GlobeAltIcon, ChartBarIcon, CurrencyDollarIcon, StarIcon, PhoneIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; const Home: React.FC = () => { const officePhotos = [ "/images/xclusive-office-visit-35.jpg", "/images/xclusive-office-visit-67.jpg", "/images/xclusive-office-visit-71.jpg", "/images/xclusive-office-visit-77.jpg", "/images/xclusive-office-visit-94.jpg", "/images/xclusive-office-visit-96.jpg" ]; return (

Why Choose Us

{[ { icon: ChartBarIcon, title: "Market Data Driven", description: "Valuations based on real market data" }, { icon: StarIcon, title: "Expert Team", description: "Certified business valuers" }, { icon: CurrencyDollarIcon, title: "Fair Pricing", description: "Transparent, competitive rates" }, { icon: GlobeAltIcon, title: "National Coverage", description: "Serving all of Australia" } ].map((benefit, index) => (

{benefit.title}

{benefit.description}

))}
); }; export default Home;
